lines.text: What goes on in this town is none of your business.
As long as I'm living here it is.
Then maybe you SHOULDN'T BE LIVING HERE!
when you turn against me - as you surely will - you remember, I am only your weapon.
My help has consequences! Will you live with those?
Stand very still my friend and I'll tell you just how fair I'm gonna be. There's two of us and
You're doing it again! Someone like me!
I overheard you and O'Rourke the other night. He was right. I was right. You should be out there, in the world, doing something!
